text.*:
This list is incomplete; you can help by expanding it.

The following is a list of women architects in California by region – notable women who are well known for their work in the field of architecture, landscape architecture, urban design, and preservation.

Northern California[edit]

Northern California includes San Jose, San Francisco, Oakland, Sacramento, and Metropolitan Fresno.

  • Helen Findlay Aycrigg[1]
  • Esther Baum Born[1][2][3]
  • Elizabeth Boyter[1]
  • Lilian Bridgman[4][1]
  • Ella Castelhun[3]
  • Louise Clever[1]
  • Edna Deakin[5]
  • Audrey Emmons[1]
  • Anne Fougeron[6]
  • Helen French[1]
  • Arabelle Hufbauer[1]
  • Vera Jansone[1]
  • Grace Jewett[3]
  • Lois Kartwold[1]
  • Michelle Kaufmann[7]
  • Evelyn Kosmak[1]
  • Roslyn Lindheim[1]
  • Gertrude Comfort Morrow[1]
  • Hilde Reiss[1]
  • Rebecca Wood Esherick Watkin[1]
  • Beverly Willis[8][9]
  • Lois Wilson Worley[1]

Southern California[edit]

Southern California can include the counties of Imperial, Kern, Los Angeles, Orange, Riverside, San Bernardino, San Diego, San Luis Obispo, Santa Barbara, and Ventura.

  • Katherine Bashford[10]
  • Barbara Bestor[11]
  • Cory Buckner[11][12]
  • Jeanine Centuori[12]
  • Olive K. Chadeayne[13]
  • Annie Chu[12]
  • Mary Colter[14]
  • Ray Eames[12]
  • Greta Grossman[15]
  • Helen Liu Fong[16]
  • Mia Lehrer[11][12]
  • Mehrnoosh Mojallali[12]
  • Julia Morgan[11][12]
  • Edith Northman[17]
  • Iris Anna Regn[12]
  • Lilian Rice[18]
  • Lutah Maria Riggs[19]
  • Ruth Shellhorn[20]
  • Paulette Singley[12]
  • Norma Merrick Sklarek[21]
  • Hazel Wood[4]
  • Florence Yoch[22]
  • Liane Zimbler[23]
  • Anne Zimmerman[12]
  • Jennifer Siegal[24]
  • Julie Eizenberg[25]
